name: Diana
description: Diana is considerate, dependable and well-organized. She can be considered as everyone's older sister that helps them with everything.

passiveSkill.name: Holy Mother
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Diana appears, allied Leader restores {placeholder} HP; her own Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Sacred Order
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Raises the flag of oath and floods the battlefield with holy light. Diana attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring all HP to the ally partner with the lowest HP, but reducing the partner's Recovery Rate by {placeholder} ."}

specialSkill.name: Divine Punishment
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Purifies the corruption to save shattered lives. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring HP equal to {placeholder} of ATK.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Punishment
normalSkill.description: Diana waves her flag. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Raises the flag of oath and floods the battlefield with holy light. Diana attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring all HP to the ally partner with the lowest HP, but reducing the partner's Recovery Rate by {placeholder} .
templateData.lens5.skill: When Diana appears, allied Leader restores {placeholder} HP; her own Heal Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Purifies the corruption to save shattered lives. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, restoring HP equal to {placeholder} of ATK.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
